games.title: Hazmob FPS: Online Shooter
games.description:
Hazmob FPS is a multiplayer shooting FPS game where every second counts! Play against other players across multiple game modes in non-stop combat. This first-person shooter game is ideal for those seeking a bit of thrill.

Skilled FPS players will love Hazmob FPS. The game features excellent, clean 3D graphics with a fluid and intuitive control system that allows you to maneuver quickly and tactically. The maps are designed for fast-paced battles in a close-quarters setting, leaving it down to pure reflex and skill to get the job done.

Play various game modes

Team Deathmatch
Search and Destroy
Capture the flag
Domination
Free for all
Elimination
Gun race
games.howToPlayText:
Controls

WASD = move
Space = jump
Left mouse = shoot
Right mouse / V = aim
P = leaderboard, pause, and settings
G = pick up the gun
C = crouch
Shift = run
1, 2, 3 = switch weapons
4, 5, 6 = skills
E = alternative skills
Q = alternative skills

But be careful - your fuel is limited, and once you stop, you‚Äôll become easy prey. Time your nitro boosts wisely, as they might be the only thing that gets you over a hill or across a deadly gap.

Shoot gun - Spacebar
Use nitro - Left Shift/N
Tilt forward/backward - Left/Right arrow or A/D

games.title: One Man Army: Battle Game
games.description: One Man Army: A casual single player Battle Game that will test your warrior skills and battle reflexes. With challenging levels and intense battles, you must use your tactical skills to survive and defend against arrows, canon, and even dragon flames.
games.howToPlayText:
Are you ready for the fun challenge in this defensive battle strategy game? One Man Army: Battle Game puts you in the shoes of an unstoppable warrior defending yourself and testing your reflexes against enemy attacks. With a variety of skills and upgrades at your disposal, you can upgrade your armory and become an unstoppable force.

As a One Man Army, you must use your battle tactics to defend and survive enemy attacks. The game tests your reflexes and strategic skills as you face wave after wave of enemy soldier's attacks. You must be quick on your feet, using the right tactics to outsmart your opponents and emerge victorious.

With each battle won you earn points to rank up, upgrade your armory and enhance your battle skills. Armory upgrades include everything from new weapons and armor to protective gear and shields. By climbing up the ranks you claim them all to be a champion battle warrior.

One Man Army: Battle Game will test your warrior skills and battle reflexes. With challenging levels and intense battles, you must use your tactical skills to survive and defend against arrows, canon, and even dragon flames.

The game features easy Battle game mechanics and realistic sound effects, immersing you to test your reflexes and battle tactics in this challenging game. You‚Äôll feel like you‚Äôre on the front lines of the battlefield action, and defending against enemy attack with every move you make.

One Man Army: Battle Game is the perfect game for anyone who loves a challenge. Are you ready to rule the battlefield and emerge victorious? Play One Man Army: Battle Game now and find out!

games.description:
NEW ISSUE OF GALACTIC NEWS

ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE ON THE RED PLANET...
- Zombie virus has spread among civilians.
- Rescuers found survivors among the zombies.
- The galactic government has urgently gone on vacation.

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ
A zombie virus outbreak has occurred on the space station. The first group of mercenaries disappeared. Your task is to find survivors among the zombies and find out the cause of the zombie apocalypse. You have to fight a horde of zombies using various types of weapons. Look for hidden weapons in chests. Upgrade characters and weapons! Use the abilities of the characters in hot battles against zombies. Play with a friend on the same device or solo!
‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ

Shoot to see in the dark!

Eliminate all the neon enemies, in the horroristic level!

The only way to see in this FPS is to generate soundwave with your weapon.

Survive endless waves of the wide variety of neon monster enemies, where the only way to see is to shoot.
Unleash soundwave rifles, laser cannons, and grenades to light up the battlefield, upgrade your gear, and fight deeper into the horroristic horde.

Every shot reveals the world‚Äîevery wave pushes your limits.

Buttons

- Rotate the mouse to control the camera

- Click the right mouse button to aim

games.title: Cannon Balls
games.description: Try to be the master of destruction, heat up the buildings neatly and show no mercy! In 'Cannon Balls 3D' it depends on how skillfully you place the shots so that the structures collapse as efficiently as possible. Watch your ammo, because it's limited. But don't worry. There will also come a time when you will bring the cannon to the edge of functionality. Especially when the great bombs are used. So what are you waiting for?
games.howToPlayText:
Aiming & Shooting:
On desktop/browser: Move your mouse to aim the cannon and click the left button to fire.
On mobile: Drag your finger (or stylus) to aim, and tap once to shoot.
Weak Points and TNT:
Target weak spots in the structure (like glass or foundation blocks) to maximize collapse.
Hitting TNT (when present) triggers chain reactions to clear multiple blocks at once.
Bomb Power-Ups:
A bomb meter fills up as you shoot shapes and earn points. When full, tap the bomb icon to switch cannonballs to bombs temporarily.
You‚Äôll normally get only three bombs per level, so use them wisely on tougher structures or large clusters.

games.description:
War Z: Path of the Survivor! - Story-driven first-person shooter. Go through the story, buy weapons, install various modules on them.

A first-person action shooter.

As a result of the man-made disaster, most of humanity was infected with a dangerous virus... which turns people into zombies

The survivors were forced to form paramilitary groups...

Who knows, maybe it's up to you to find the antidote to the virus and save humanity...

- The world of the zombie apocalypse.
- An exciting storyline.
- Hordes of zombies from the simplest to the mutated.
- A variety of weapons from the real world.
- Various weapon modules and a leveling system.
games.howToPlayText:
Control:
- WASD - movement,
- LSHIFT - switch to running,
- SPACEBAR - jump.
- LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - shoot,
- RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON - aim,
- T - inspect the weapons.
- R - reload.

games.title: Bow Brawls
games.description:
Bow Brawls ‚Äì Top-Down Archery Battles!

Enter Bow Brawls, a thrilling archery survival game where you aim with drag controls that feel like a real bow. Pull, release, and strike down endless waves of enemies! Each wave ends with a powerful boss fight, forcing you to master skill and strategy.

Unlock 5 unique bows, 5 armors, and 5 arenas as you progress. Every weapon and battleground adds a new style of play. Face bosses with special abilities and prove your reflexes in intense battles.

Compete with players worldwide through global leaderboards. Show off your best scores and climb to the top to become the ultimate archer.

Perfect for casual players, kids, and competitive gamers, Bow Brawls is easy to pick up yet challenging to master. Endless action, exciting unlocks, and competitive spirit await you.

üéØ Aim true. ‚öî Defeat bosses. üëë Rule the leaderboard.
Play Bow Brawls now and test your archery skills!
games.howToPlayText:
How to Play

In Bow Brawls, survive endless waves of enemies using skill and precision. Use the joystick (mobile) or WASD (PC) to move. Aim by pulling the on-screen joystick in the opposite direction of your target‚Äîrelease to shoot arrows like a real bow.

Enemies attack from all directions, including melee fighters and ranged shooters. Every few waves, a boss appears with unique skills like dashing, jumping over you, or launching projectiles‚Äîstay alert and adapt!

Defeat bosses to earn gems, which unlock new bows and armors with different abilities. Reach higher scores to unlock new arenas and face tougher challenges.

Your score is based on enemy kills, with each type rewarding different points. Climb the leaderboards by defeating as many enemies as possible. Manage your health bar carefully‚Äîyou only get one life per run.

Master your aim, survive waves, defeat bosses, and rise as the ultimate archer!

games.title: Nubik in the Monster World!
games.description:
Nubik saved the kittens and defeated all the monsters! But it wasn‚Äôt over yet - the monsters came back!
The evil Huggy has kidnapped all the kittens again!

But this time, Nubik got himself a whole arsenal of new weapons! In the game, you'll find an AK-47, an M16 rifle, a grenade launcher, a machine gun, and two powerful shotguns!

Help Nubik find the kittens to earn a million coins! Search for and open loot chests. Upgrade your character and blow up TNT blocks! Also, Nubik‚Äôs friend often gets captured by monsters and thrown behind bars. Help Nubik escape from prison!
games.howToPlayText:
In the settings menu, you can enable the auto-shoot feature ‚Äî it's especially convenient when playing on a phone. You can also adjust mouse sensitivity for PC or swipe sensitivity for mobile in the main menu. The radar will help you easily navigate through the level!
Controls:
For PC:
Mouse ‚Äì rotate the camera
Tab or Esc ‚Äì pause
WASD ‚Äì move
Left mouse button ‚Äì shoot
F or E ‚Äì interact

For mobile:
Swipe on the screen to rotate the camera
Joystick ‚Äì move
Tap quickly on the screen ‚Äì shoot

games.title: Mr Shooter
games.description:
Mr Shooter, a Balloon popping desert plant on a mission... A mission to pop all the Balloons in the world!
The objective is simple: Pop all the Balloons to win!
Unlock and select new powerful cards as you progress through the game. With hundreds of creative and varied levels, this game will keep you entertained for hours.
games.howToPlayText:
Tap anywhere on the screen to shoot needles from Mr. Shooter.
Your goal is to hit the spinning cactus targets with your needles.

Assault on Squid Island is an action-packed action game in which you have to survive a deadly battle on a mysterious island. Your main goal is to destroy all the enemies and find a way to escape from this sinister place.

What makes the game special:

Thrilling battles with realistic combat system

Unique locations with a unique atmosphere

A fascinating story that will keep you in suspense until the very end.

Immerse yourself in a world where every step can be lost, and every decision is crucial in the struggle for survival.

games.title: Dark City. Multiplayer
games.description:
Dark City. Multiplayer is an online open-world horror game where players are divided into two factions: police and bandits, fighting for control over an abandoned city consumed by darkness.

The world is alive and shared among all players ‚Äî every step could lead to a confrontation with an enemy... or something far worse.

The police try to restore order, protect survivors, and reclaim captured territories.

The bandits aim to establish their rule by taking over zones, setting ambushes, and hiding in the shadows.

Capture areas, hold control, fend off enemy attacks‚Ä¶ and survive the horror slowly awakening in the depths of the city.

games.title: Bullet Echo
games.description:
Lead your team to victory in this unique PvP tactical team shooter! Choose from dozens of different heroes with unique play styles and abilities. Unite with friends, set a strategy, and be the last team standing when the battle ends. Your vision is limited by the beam of a flashlight, but you can hear enemies' steps and shots. Unlock and upgrade new heroes, participate in championships, and fight to unlock new perks, maps, and game modes!

Bullet Echo ‚Äî Game Description
Bullet Echo is a tactical, team-based PvP shooter with a unique top-down perspective, developed by ZeptoLab. The game stands out for its stealth-focused gameplay, fast-paced battles, and emphasis on teamwork.

Key Features
Unique Tactical Stealth Action:
Your vision is limited by the beam of a flashlight, but you can hear enemies' steps and shots. This creates suspenseful, strategic encounters where sound and positioning are crucial.

Team Play and Strategy:
Play with friends or match with players worldwide. Unite your team, set a strategy, and be the last team standing. The level of your hero is matched with the highest in your party, making it easy to play with friends of any experience.

Diverse Heroes:
Choose from dozens of different heroes, each with unique play styles, weapons, and abilities. Unlock and upgrade heroes to boost their power and unlock new perks.

Multiple Game Modes:

Battle Royale: Five teams of three players each compete to be the last team standing on a shrinking map.

Team vs Team: Two teams of five players face off on exclusive maps.

King of the Hill: Solo mode with 15 players battling for survival.

Additional modes and maps are available as you progress.

Progression and Rewards:
Participate in championships, accomplish missions, and receive valuable resources. Unlock new heroes, perks, maps, and game modes as you play.

Gameplay Overview
Top-Down Shooter:
The game uses a top-down view, giving players an aerial perspective of the battlefield. Stealth, quick reflexes, and tactical movement are essential.

Auto-Shooting:
Heroes automatically fire when an enemy enters their firing cone, allowing players to focus on movement and positioning.

Looting:
Collect weapons, ammo, armor, and power-ups during matches to enhance your hero‚Äôs abilities.

Revive System:
Teammates can revive each other during battles, adding another layer of teamwork and strategy.
games.howToPlayText:
Main Objectives
Team up with friends or play solo to compete in tactical PvP battles.

Survive and eliminate enemy teams using stealth, strategy, and your hero‚Äôs unique abilities.

Collect loot and power-ups to strengthen your hero during each match.

Be the last team or player standing to win the round.

Desktop Controls (if playing via emulator or official desktop version)
Note: Bullet Echo is primarily a mobile game, but can be played on PC via Android emulators. Controls may vary depending on emulator settings.

W, A, S, D / Arrow Keys: Move your hero.

Mouse: Aim your flashlight cone (direction of vision).

Left Mouse Button: Use hero‚Äôs special ability (if mapped).

Spacebar: Interact with objects or revive teammates (if mapped).

Esc: Open game menu or pause.

You can customize key bindings in most emulators for optimal comfort.

Mobile Controls
Virtual Joystick (Left side): Move your hero around the map.

Swipe / Drag (Right side): Aim your flashlight and field of vision.

Ability Button: Tap to activate your hero‚Äôs special ability.

Interact Button: Tap to pick up items, open chests, or revive teammates.

Auto-Shoot: Your hero fires automatically when an enemy enters your cone of vision.

Tips for Success
Use walls and obstacles for cover and to ambush enemies.

Listen for enemy footsteps and gunfire to locate opponents in the fog of war.

Stick with your team for better chances of survival and to revive each other.

Upgrade and experiment with different heroes to find your best play style.

Master the controls and tactics to dominate the arena in Bullet Echo!

Always dreamed about a lifesaver career? Gibbets Bow Master - archery target shooting games will give you the opportunity!
Shoot the ropes, but avoid hitting the stickman in our bow games.
Earn achievements.
Beat the scores and become the champion archer.

games.title: Stalker 2033: The Path of the Survivor
games.description: Stalker 2033: The Path of the Survivor ‚Äì A 3D action shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. Battle the undead, explore vast locations, uncover dark secrets, and fight to survive in a mysterious, deadly new reality.
games.howToPlayText:
Stalker 2033: The Path of the Survivor  - is an 3D action shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world.. Collect an arsenal of deadly weapons and fight for survival!


A huge location populated by a wide variety of inhabitants!

The quiet life of the middle lane is disrupted by a mysterious catastrophe ‚Äì an unknown phenomenon turns people into the living dead. The main character finds himself in the epicenter of the tragedy by accident: being away from the city, he learns about the beginning of the apocalypse just two weeks after it began.

Now he has to not only fight for survival in a new, cruel world, but also reveal its secrets. Collecting information bit by bit, he tries to understand the nature of the disaster and its impact on people..

Gameplay Features:

‚Ä¢ Exploring a post-apocalyptic world 
‚Ä¢ Interacting with the few survivors
‚Ä¢ Search for resources and create equipment
‚Ä¢ * Battles with different opponents
‚Ä¢ Thrilling zombie apocalypse storyline
‚Ä¢ Realistic arsenal of weapons

Immerse yourself in the exciting world of the post-apocalypse! Collect an arsenal of deadly weapons and fight for survival!

games.title: Get Off My Farm!
games.description:
Protect your farm from relentless waves of mutant pests in this action-packed defense shooter!
Your quiet farmland is swarmed by strange and dangerous creatures, and only your guns and quick reflexes can keep them away from your crops. Blast through incoming enemies and pick up temporary power-ups along the way ‚Äî rapid-fire shots, explosive ammo, health refills, or extra energy for your electric fence.

Survive enough waves and the stage ends, giving you a choice of random upgrades: unlock new weapons, call in a crop duster airstrike, slow down enemy hordes, attract power-ups with a magnet, and more. As you advance, new heroes with unique styles and abilities become available.

Every run feels fresh thanks to randomized upgrades and ever-growing chaos. Can you hold the line and prove yourself as the ultimate defender of the farm?
games.howToPlayText: Use arrow keys or WASD to move your character across the farm. On mobile, swipe the screen to move. Your weapon fires automatically, so just focus on dodging and aiming.

games.title: Squid Game Tower Defense
games.description:
Squid Game Tower Defense battle against Squid Game characters in the towers. Complete challenges, defeat enemies, and become the victor in this thrilling fight!

Welcome to Squid Game Tower Defense ‚Äî a unique and thrilling game where you will battle against characters from the famous Squid Game show. Unlike traditional Tower Defense games, your task here is not to defend towers but to attack and fight enemies that reside within them.

Each tower is not just a structure; it's a place where dangerous characters are waiting for battle. You'll engage in a series of exciting fights, defeating enemies at every level and overcoming various challenges. The game features characters well-known to all fans of the show, each with its own unique abilities and characteristics.

Complete levels, improve your combat skills, gather valuable resources, and unlock new opportunities for your battles. Make sure that your strategic abilities help you defeat even the toughest enemies standing in your way. Enjoy fast-paced combat, challenging missions, and an atmosphere that immerses you into the world of Squid Game.
games.howToPlayText: Fight with the squid characters in the towers. Use your skills and strategy to defeat the enemies in each level. Overcome the challenges and become a winner! Drag and drop your character onto the desired enemy platform.

games.title: Planet 404. Episode 1
games.description:
In this exciting puzzle platformer players embark on an amazing journey with Alice, a brave and curious explorer who finds herself stranded on a mysterious planet filled with secrets. Surrounded by enigmatic landscapes, this world is filled with puzzles that must be solved to uncover its mysteries.

 Each solution and obstacle overcome not only propels the player forward, but also reveals new chapters of Alice's adventure. The game's graphics are designed in a vibrant and colorful style, and the musical accompaniment creates an atmosphere of magic and mystery, immersing the player in an exciting world full of wonders and surprises.
games.howToPlayText:
On a computer:
To make the character run to the right, press the D button (or the right arrow) on the keyboard.
To make the character run to the left, press the A button (or the left arrow).
To jump, press the space bar (or the up arrow).

On a smartphone or tablet:
To make the character run to the right, tap the right arrow at the bottom of the screen.
To make the character run to the left, tap the left arrow.
To jump, tap the up arrow.
To fire a shot (which becomes available at a certain level), press the fire icon button.

games.title: EdgeFire
games.description:
EdgeFire is a fast-paced online shooter that throws you into thrilling battles against real players from around the world. Whether you're flying solo or teaming up with friends, every match is a chance to prove your dominance on the battlefield.

Sharpen your aim and unleash lightning-fast reflexes, earn rewards, and become the top player in each round. Outsmart your opponents with clever tactics and strategic plays that turn the tide of battle in your favor.

Dive into action-packed gameplay with a variety of stunning skins that enhance your experience and appeal to both seasoned shooter veterans and newcomers alike. Each battle is a fresh challenge, packed with intensity and adrenaline.

Step into the arena, test your skills, and rise to glory. Are you ready to dominate the fight?
games.howToPlayText:
WASD - move
R - reload
Left mouse button - shoot
Esc - pause menu

games.title: Air Warfare
games.description: Fly into excitement with **Air Warfare**, an endless game where you take charge of a combat plane. Shoot down foes, gather ammo, avoid attacks, and strive for survival. Compete for high scores while enjoying smooth gameplay on both mobile and desktop devices.

games.title: Gunner Pursuit
games.description: Dive into the thrilling universe of Gunner Pursuit, where fast-paced action and weaponry collide. Experience intense pursuits and shoot from your fast-moving vehicle while navigating enemies. Enhance your gear for survival and triumph in every challenging stage. Enjoy this free game on your phone or computer for continuous excitement.
games.howToPlayText:
Keyboard
Look around - Mouse movement
Shoot - Left-click
Lock/Unlock Cursor - L

games.title: Shoot & Sprint: Warfare
games.description: In the game, you will find yourself in the role of a brave fighter who rushes forward without stopping. Your task is to shoot the enemies and survive in this fast‚Äîpaced action game.
games.howToPlayText:
Here's everything you need to know to become a shooting master.:

Basic rules
Automatic running: Your character runs forward by himself. You don't need to control the movement ‚Äî just focus on shooting.

Shooting: Use the screen or mouse button to shoot in different directions. Enemies are appearing from all sides, so be prepared for quick shootouts.

Management
Shooting: Tap on the screen or use the buttons to shoot.

Save ammo: Shoot accurately to avoid wasting ammo.

Collect bonuses: You can find first-aid kits, ammo, and temporary weapon upgrades on the levels.

Upgrade weapons: After each level, unlock new weapons and upgrade them for more damage.

games.title: Ball Attack
games.description: Blast through endless waves of bouncing balls, dodge incoming obstacles, and upgrade your powerful cannon to survive longer in this intense, fast-paced arcade shooter filled with nonstop action and explosive fun!
games.howToPlayText:
Drag to Move: Slide your finger (or mouse) left and right to control the cannon.
Shoot Automatically: Your cannon fires continuously‚Äîfocus on aiming and dodging!
Destroy Balls: Each ball has a number‚Äîshoot to reduce it to zero and blast it apart.
Dodge Everything: Avoid touching balls or it‚Äôs game over!
Collect Coins: Use coins to upgrade your firepower, speed, and special abilities.
Survive Waves: The longer you last, the tougher (and more rewarding) it gets!

games.title: Ammo Rush Master
games.description:
Get ready to run, multiply, and blast your way to victory in Ammo Rush Master!
Dodge obstacles, choose the right gates, and build the biggest Ammo army of bullets. Then, grab your blaster and unleash a storm of foam darts to smash through targets, enemies, and bosses!

? Features

Addictive hyper-casual gameplay ‚Äì easy to play, hard to master.

Fun math gates that boost or reduce your army.

Colorful worlds: beach, city, rainbow skies, desert, and more.

Huge variety of Ammo-style blasters to unlock and upgrade.

Exciting boss battles at the end of each world.

Smooth controls and satisfying shooting effects.

‚ö° Can you become the ultimate Ammo Rush Master and blast your way to the top? Download now and find out!
games.howToPlayText:
? How to Play

Run through the track and pass through gates (+, -, √ó, √∑) to increase your firepower.

Collect stickman allies and multiply your shooting strength.

Avoid traps and tricky gates that can reduce your numbers.

At the end, aim your Ammo blaster and fire away to break through walls and bosses!

games.title: Cannon Strike
games.description:
Welcome to the fun world of Cannon Strike, an arcade game where you shoot balls from a cannon! It's very easy to play.
So, are you ready to aim and fire? Download Cannon Strike Ball now and start playing! Challenge yourself to see how many levels you can pass! 
Get the game today and have a blast shooting cannonballs!
games.howToPlayText:
To finish a level, you need to fill all the buckets with balls. ü™£
Drop the right number of balls into each bucket to move to the next level. Watch out for moving obstacles that can block your shots!
In Cannon Strike, aim and shoot as many cannonballs as you can into the basket. It's a game that tests your aiming skills with a bit of physics fun!
